Just between you and me I don't have a problem with it (well actually 
my only problem is we can't keep up with every shot we fire, but I 
don't mind so long as it's simply a matter of change ammo regularly 
or run out), I just feel all arguments need to be debated over until 
ALL possibilities have been seen, and further more NIETHER OF US ARE 
ON THE COUNCIL SO WE SHOULD BOTH SHUT UP!  And now a BIC to get back 
to the point....somewhat.

Owlhawk comes in visual range of the Maximal base.  As they fly 
towards it Hawk and Owl begin to talk.

Hawk:  Hey if the Sarga want to help us why don't they just teach us 
how to bud....assuming Vok are really that smart.

Owl gets a mocking tone at this stupid question.

Owl:  I have a better idea why don't they revive Unicron.  Do you 
really want to face hords of Primus deprieved bots, and the Swarm 
again.

Hawk:  ....Weeellll....no not really I see your point.

They land.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> Dewboy stop trying to find ways out of not having infinite ammo. 
Grow up a 
> little bit and try to act like an adult. Noone has any complaints 
about not 
> having unlimited ammo except for you and if this is a democratic 
RPG it would 
> seem as though you have lost.
